item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 07 Jun 2022
item.description:
1. carray.0.0.1
  2. ML Family Workshop 2022: Final Call for Presentations
  3. OCaml Users and Developers Workshop 2022
  4. dkml-c-probe.2.0.0: Cross-compiler friendly definitions for C compiling
  5. Full-Stack Web Dev in OCaml Tutorial w/ Dream, Bonsai, and GraphQL
  6. Sketch.sh now supports multiple compiler versions, starting with 4.13.1
  7. Explicit type binding and mutual recursion
  8. findlib-1.9.4
  9. omake-0.10.4
